title: 怎么样让玩家拥有领取地皮的权限，插件是plotme
author: 机制的green

replies.txt_content:
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
plotme.use.remove
把这些权限加进去
输入/mangaddp 组名 权限名添加权限

replies.author: 2014丶小皇帝
replies.txt_content:
给builder组加这些权限
/mangaddp builder plotme.use[给builder使用地皮]
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.add[给builder分享地皮]
/mangaddp builder plotme.remove[给builder删除地皮]

replies.author: 机制的green
replies.txt_content: 你们说了这么多，我都不懂，是加在哪个文件？plugins/PlotMe里面的哪个文件？congif还是caption-english？说明白一点{:10_516:}
